EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM Spring Security Authentication with Spring Boot.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Spring Security Authentication... with Spring Boot and More!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar Spring Security Authentication... with Spring Boot and More! on Thursday, March 10, 2016.
Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, March 10, 2016 Time: 3:00PM Time (London, GMT)
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1148208/5C9CF21C6D6A1E3795C3E68ACFB53DDF]]> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
We look forward to you joining us!
